CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(CC_Idioma__c)=="ca",IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12, 2)) < 12, "Bon dia", (IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12, 2)) < 19, "Bona tarda", "Bona nit"))),IF(TEXT(CC_Idioma__c)=="en",IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12, 2)) < 12, "Good morning", (IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12, 2)) < 19, "Good afternoon", "Good night"))),IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12, 2)) < 12, "Buenos d√≠as", (IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12, 2)) < 19, "Buenas tardes", "Buenas noches")))))
CustomField.label: Saludo horario
